Classes

These are nice data types for dealing with... Data!

dataconn
class dataconn {
mixed data;
string path;
int pos;
int parent_fd;
int type;
int len;
int append;
}
session
class session {
int fd;
string user_name;
int logged_in;
string cwd;
string data_addr;
int last_data;
int data_port;
int data_fd;
int type;
int idle;
string rnfr;
int offset;
int use_default;
int pasv_fd;
int pasv_cb;
}
